Q1. What is the time span of delivery?
A1: The food item will be delivered based on the location of customer, Still, we assure you to deliver your food item within 30mins
Q2. How much will be the delivery Charges?
A2: The delivery charges will be in the range of Rs30-Rs50 with respect to the distance of user from the restaurant.
A5: Yes, our app will run on lower end devices smoothly without any lag
Q5. Can I install this app on device having 1GB of RAM?
A4: Yes, you can Google pay the amount at the time of delivery using the UPI ID as zesty@sbiIndia.
Q4. Can I pay the amount using UPI apps on delivery? If yes then what is the UPI ID?
A3: Sorry for inconvenience, currently we dont support cancellation on order. However, we are trying our best to bring this service in our app.
Q3. How should I cancel my order?
Order History
Hello blank fragment
Q6. Is there any refund available?
A6: We are sorry to inform you that currently we don\'t refund as the order itself is not cancellable
